channel.title: Running on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu
channel.description: Recent content in Running on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: Sharat
item.description: 2014 October While month of September 2014 was supposed to a unique one, It started like just another month of the year. Honestly it has 17th September which is most times ‘Bishwakarma Puja’ and Pamela’s B’day. From childhood Bishwakarma puja has a special one growing up in Tripura. After Saraswati puja in January/February there was no major festival till Bishwakarma Puja. And there used to pandals and people going out in the evening to visit those pandals.
